import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class Profile extends Component { state = { myProfile: { }, firstname:null, secondname:null, address:null, middlename:null, password:null, phone:null, role:null, _id:null, passportArea:null }; handlechange = (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; const value = target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value, }); }; submit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const payload = { firstname: this.state.firstname, middlename: this.state.middlename, lastname: this.state.lastname, email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password, phone: this.state.phone, address: this.state.address, }; await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/accounts/register", method: "POST", data: payload, }) .then( (response) => ( this.setState({ datas: response }), alert(response.data.message) ) ) .catch(() => console.log("Register Başarısız")); }; passportAreaHandle=()=>{ this.setState({passportArea:(
)} ) } componentWillMount= async()=>{ await this.jwtHandler() this.setState({ firstname: this.state.firstname, middlename: this.state.middlename, lastname: this.state.lastname, email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password, phone: this.state.phone, address: this.state.address, }) } jwtHandler = async () => { await axios({ url: "http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/accounts/profile", method: "GET", headers: { Authorization: window.localStorage.getItem("token"), }, }) .then((response) => this.setState({ myProfile: response.data.payload.account }) ) .catch(() => console.log("Profil gösterilemedi")); console.log(this.state.myProfile) }; render() { return (

Edit Profile

Change Password

{this.state.myProfile.firstname + " "+this.state.myProfile.middlename +" "+ this.state.myProfile.lastname }

{this.state.myProfile.email}

PROGRAM

); } }
